attributes.review: I just wanted to take time to see if he actually is a great president but I was very disappointed, I just don’t like him. He looks like annoying orange but the bootleg grandpa version. So ew.
attributes.title: ew

attributes.review: i am a HUGE trump supporter but this app is just too glitchy!!! i dont understands whats going on!!!!!!!!! i am flabbergasted!!!!!!!!! i wish i could give this a 0/10 🤬🤬
attributes.title: i can’t believe this🤬🤬😡😤

attributes.review: Ok so like once I opened the app I’ve seen 💩 and like I was super scared 😭😭.Then I dropped my phone and even and cat was scared like she was so scared I haven’t seen my cat for a week!!! 0/10 do not recommend!!!!!!

I opened the app to read “Who’s a dumb b!tc#?” And there was a photo of Donald Jenius Trump pointing at the screen towards me! I felt so offended. No one should download this app it’s completely horrific.
attributes.title: 0/5 Don’t Even Bother

attributes.review: If I could give this app a zero or below I would this has nothing but fake news there’s so much glitches. It’s the worst app that has been possibly made.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER MADE!!!

attributes.review: i was so excited 😁about this app because i love our dear president🇺🇸 and wanted to get more involved and maybe even donate💵 to his campaign, boy was i wrong 😤when i thought this was going to be a well educating well thought out app😡 i am extremely disappointed ☹️. i think i speak 🗣 for all of my fellow trump supporters🤑 and baby 👶🏼 boomers.
attributes.title: crappy💩 app📱

attributes.review: I honestly thought Trump's campaign couldn't get any worse. Then I downloaded this app. Probably one of the laziest, fakest, most puke-inducing thing I have ever seen.
attributes.title: Absolutely Disgusting

attributes.review: This scared the life out of my seven year old daughter when I opened the page, now she is afraid of Cheto puffs with faces thanks a lot. She wakes me up at twelve and tells me she had a nightmare of you.
attributes.title: Dear trump

attributes.review: When I opened, the app immediately asked for my number. It texted me and I did not enjoy it. Would NOT recommend for anybody who wants and sense of peace in their mind or for anybody with a soul. ONE STAR!!!!!!!
attributes.title: Bad App

attributes.review: The ads were VERY inappropriate and it constantly crashed and took forever to load!
attributes.title: Bad!!
